title: Angel of Darkness (Angel of Darkness Fast-Paced Action Thrillers Book 2)
features: Vengeance is a woman. She never forgets. Never forgives. And never fails to get even.
“A great, fast-paced read with an awesome lead character!” Anthony Rocha

Ex-assassin Tess Williams hunts the monsters that prey on the innocent: murderers, rapists, gangbangers, pimps… So when a crazed sniper starts blasting people from Manhattan's rooftops, Tess dives into the city's shadows to nail him, leaving a trail of carnage in her wake.Tess's hunt for leads plunges her into the sleazy underworld of white supremacy and illegal arms deals. Yet no matter who she begs, bribes, or batters, all she uncovers is a mystery as tangled as it is deadly.Tess battles on, determined to stop this psycho because if she fails, the blood of his innocent victims will be on her hands.But the clock is ticking and the killer is already lining up his next target.And just when Tess thinks she's caught a break, disaster strikes…
"Check out this series it's awesome. If you like the Jack Reacher books this is for you." Bryan K Roschi
“A good fast-paced read with a fabulous female lead.” Julie Elizabeth Powell, Top 1000 Reviewer
"I rank Tess up with my 2 favorite female characters: Jet & Beatrix Rose." Pat Parko
“Incredible Thriller! This book grabs you by the collar and drags you into a fast paced, exciting world.” Kelly Watley
“Great stuff. Jack Reacher meets Girl with the dragon tattoo.” Linn C.
“Yet another fast paced book from Steve - couldn't put this one down.” Karen Bryan
“I loved this book. It had great characters, a good story line that kept me glued to the book until the last page, and an exciting ending.” Dona Smith

★★★★★From Amazon #1 bestselling author Steve N. Lee comes a story that will see you turning pages quicker than you ever thought possible. A smart blend of Lee Child's Jack Reacher and TV's Nikita, Tess Williams is a hero you'll love rooting for.
description: ★★★★★ "I read the other reviews and being a big Jack Reacher fan found it hard to believe that there could be a female version! How wrong was I!!!Brilliant action packed book. It really is for fans of Jack Reacher!"
★★★★★ "Fast-paced and action-packed, it takes you on a ride you don't want to stop!"
★★★★★ "Reacher fans should enjoy this ... a thrill-packed adrenaline rush."
★★★★★ "A good fast-paced read with a fabulous female lead."

★★★★★ "Literally had to tear myself away from the books... Sacrificed exercise, TV, quality family time and other day-to-day normalities. Love the writing style, love the story line and love Tess. How long before Tess appears on the big screen?"
★★★★★ "if you love dark thrillers with plenty of action then this is for you"
★★★★★ "I just love the one-woman demolition squad that is Tess Williams. A very strong female lead who has just enough flaws and insecurities to keep it real."
★★★★★ "Kick ass female avenging angel, non-stop action, vengeance like we all would like to dispense."
★★★★★ "Fast paced thriller with suspense packed onto every page."
If you love pulse-pounding action and dark, flawed heroes, you really should check out my
, because I wrote it for thriller lovers just like you!Happy reading,Steve N. Lee

Lee', 'about': ['> Heartwarming dog stories', '> Gripping historical fiction', '> Pulse-pounding thrillers', 'I’ve hand-fed a wild orangutan in a rainforest, explored exotic locations such as Machu Picchu, and sparred with a monk at a Shaolin temple. As you can tell, I love seeking out extraordinary adventures. So what more appropriate profession could I find than writing — creating wondrous worlds filled with fascinating characters?', 'I’ve been a full-time author since 2016 and write in multiple genres — you’ll find my books crammed with either adorable mutts who’ll melt your heart, justice-seeking antiheroes, or heartbreaking tales inspired by true stories from the Holocaust.', 'I pen my novels in the North of England, where I live with my Polish partner and two stray black cats who turned up in our garden one day and liked it so much they moved into the house.', 'So whether you love to curl up with heartwarming tales about lovable dogs, gritty, action-packed thrillers, or heart-wrenching stories from history’s darkest hour, I hope you’ll join me on my literary journey.', 'Happy reading,', 'Steve', 'http://stevenleebooks.com/', 'For updates or info about my work, click the big yellow “Follow” button under my photo above or check out my website.']}
